name: Stranded (itch) (LonelyDevil)
description:
Howdy, welcome to my first game ever! I'm just a 14 - years old boy who is interested in making games. There will be plenty of bugs and I would be happy if you were to report them. I will also try my best to debug my game and if I get about $5 from donation, I would be more than happy, since $1 would be enough for me to be encouraged to add more features. There will be a lot of updates if I'm free enough, but if not, I don't think Stranded will have more features anytime soon.

Hope to see you guys soon,

Lonely Devil
